Exercise 1

Browse the websites of gaming companies that you may be familiar with or get acquainted with while completing this task. Share five publications that you like in terms of how the information is presented. Please answer in tabular form
Site Link What problem does this article solve? Why does the design suit the task?
Rockstar Games The Western Powersurge Now Available at Legendary Motorsport Presentation of a new game motorcycle, New Year's gifts and a story about new products
  • New Year's background lifts the mood and sets you up to receive gifts;
  • different information is separated by design (images, colors, headings);
  • used sliders, stylized lists, pop-ups to enhance the impression of the article;
  • New Year's frames for images, show the relatedness of the design to the topic of the article
Blizzard Entertainment What’s Playing on Battle.net: News and notable events in late December 2022 Presentation of new additions on the Battle.net platform
  • page navigation is used, which is very convenient;
  • information about each game is graphically separated (headings, indents, separators);
  • graphic material and links to details are attached to each game;
  • the design is simple and not overloaded, which facilitates the perception of basic information
Ubisoft Entertainment Assassin’s Creed Mirage Takes Players to Ninth Century Baghdad The release of a new location in the game has been announced
  • added images to complement the text content;
  • the headings highlight the main points;
  • the design of all articles is designed in the same style;
  • the emphasis is not on the design, but on the content of the article
Bethesda Softworks Bethesda’s 2022 Holiday Gift Guide The merch has been announced as a gift
  • the color of the main menu changes depending on the color palette of the main image, which makes the composition complete;
  • the main topic and description are added to the beginning of the article, in a large, attention-grabbing font;
  • the merch photos and purchase links were used;
  • simple design helps you quickly find what you need
Electronics Arts «It Takes Two Is Now» Available On Nintendo Switch Announcing the game for the Nintendo Switch platform
  • used video, images to display gameplay;
  • highlighted call-to-action phrases;
  • full-screen title and description, in large font to attract attention and understand what the article will be about
  • minimalism in design allows you to quickly find the information you need

Exercise 2

The most important article of each month is the patch notes publication dedicated to the release of a new game update.
Compare the following two patch notes articles—published in 2021 and 2022, respectively. Describe the differences between them in terms of what you think improved and/or worsened. What would you leave untouched? What would you change and why?
Link 1 Link 2
Don’t hold back—be as brutally honest as you want.
  • Part 5

    It's great that a more improved navigation has been selected, including through the use of an accordion. But, navigation at the top of the page, for example, is not immediately noticeable.

    And I would also add some kind of navigation on the page, perhaps following the user, or to which I would not have to scroll for too long, for example, after the headings.

  • Part 6

    The expand button is not too highlighted, which may take time to find it.

    Also, it seems to me that the arrow on the button looks like a technical one and differs from the general design of the page.

  • Part 7

    Also, because of the page differences, more graphics have been added, which is undoubtedly a plus. Because information with pictures is better perceived and processed, and it becomes more interesting to read.

    I love when everything is thought out to the smallest detail, therefore, the idea with the «download» button on the images, I think, made it a little easier for many to use the site.

  • Part 1

    A good solution was to add an accordion in the new edition.

    Often, when a user sees a large amount of information, he becomes too lazy to scroll through and read it all.

    Therefore, when the user opens the article and sees that there is no long scroll, he is more likely to read it.

  • Part 2

    Personally, I like it better when the elements on the page have more margins, so that the page seems to "breathe", so the perception of information improves.

    Also, I would add more interactive elements or animations to make it interesting for a person to be on the page.

  • Part 3

    It's a good idea to reward a user for reading a long article.

    This motivates him to continue to stay on the page and familiarize himself more closely with the contents of the article in order to possibly find even more gifts. And in general, gifts, it's always nice.

  • Part 4

    Also, the appearance in the new article of animated examples of gameplay improvements adds a better understanding of the content of the article and changes in the game.

    I would have left that untouched.

Exercise 3

Сheck out the “about the game” page. List design and layout mistakes. How can it be improved? What is the expected effect of the improvement?
Link

Design

Part 1

The main screen is overloaded with images.

It would be better to make blurred borders for video covers, like the images later in the article and add transparency. Or replace the background image with a neutral one, to make information easier to understand.

Part 2

Duplicates the design of the button on the same screen for different actions.

And again, the bright button adds colors to the main screen, which makes it look overloaded.

Depending on which action is first required from the user, such a button and highlight it brighter.

Part 3

The poster on the video is of low quality, as well as on the main screen (see the first photo).

If the user has a low Internet connection or a weak computer, he will have to look at the low-quality poster for a long time.Therefore, it is necessary to improve the quality of the poster.

Part 4

The border in the photo is knocked out of the overall design of the blurred borders of the images.

Also, the images are superimposed on each other and the upper background is translucent under the lower one.You can connect the borders on the design or make a smooth transition.

Part 5

There is no background photo or video in the mobile version, which looks unfinished.

You can add a color selection or some kind of screensaver.

Layout

Part 1

The content is not centered of the div, if it was necessary to add an indent from the bottom, it is better to use padding. It's also better to use semantic tags for the text, for example - p.

Part 2

With a screen width of 414px (my phone), icons stick together and move out.

They can either be scaled down or placed vertically.

Part 3

If the video should not be displayed on the page, it is better to exclude it from the DOM tree, rather than hide it, because it will still load on the page, which will slow down the download.

Part 4

What clearly resembles icons, for example, in this case, it is better to connect in .svg, .webp format. They have more advantages, such as optimization, performance, download speed and better quality than .png.

Part 5

The text appearing on the images would be better to insert the code, it is more useful for SEO optimization.

Part 6

When the height of the containers in the slider is fixed, the text is cut off at some resolutions.

It is better to set the container min-height property.

Part 7

Absolute links to images.

Forces the browser to do more work by requesting an IP address from the DNS server each time, even if the server is yours.

Part 8

A lot of empty tags, I didn't find what they can be used for.

Get rid of empty tags whenever possible.

Part 9

There is a lot of margin in the closing elements, it is better to use 1 common.

Exercise 4

Follow the link below to the website’s “training” page:
Link
Navigate through the different tabs. Try to find some technical or logical layout flaws. How could it be corrected?

Part 1

The headline jumps, a sharp transition

Add a transition to appear, add steps in the animation of moving the title to make it look smoother.

LINK

Part 2

The highlighted link doesn't make sense if the whole card is clickable

Either remove the link, or highlight the link when hovering over it, or leave the clickable link only.

LINK

Part 3

The «hide» button goes far away. Also, its arrow should logically be directed in the other direction.

Leave it where the show button is, flip the arrow.

LINK

Part 4

The text on the arrows goes beyond the boundaries of the screen, at the top the arrows go beyond the boundaries of the content

Equalize the height with the content, provide an adaptive for the text, or make it pop up when hovering, or remove it altogether.

LINK

Part 5

The same cases with icons (see exercise 3, paragraph «layout»). Absolute links and png format for icons

Use .svg, .web formats, borders. Use relative links. Simple icons can be drawn using css.

LINK

Part 6

I want to fill the space so that everything is uniform

I would align the icons and their titles in the center and add indents from the main title.

LINK

Part 7

Bold text is more highlighted than subheadings and is poorly readable.

Change the design of bold text.

LINK

Part 8

The quality of the mouse and keyboard image differs (the mouse is blurred)

Use the best quality mouse image (.svg, .webp format). Or use one format for these images.

LINK

Part 9

The icon and the list marker are used together.

Either add an icon to the end of the list (as on the previous pages), or discard the list marker.

LINK

Part 10

2 rows of tabs

It is possible to use a slider when there are too many tabs.

LINK

Part 11

The page becomes very large when all the tabs are open

When one tab opens, close the rest.

LINK
